title: Maya Jama shows off Ruben Dias' glittering trophy room after holiday
description: TV STAR Maya Jama has shown off Man City defender Ruben Dias’ glittering trophy room in a behind-the-scenes Instagram upload. Maya, 30, and Dias, 27, have been dating for months and are alway…
content:
TV STAR Maya Jama has shown off Man City defender Ruben Dias' glittering trophy room in a behind-the-scenes Instagram upload.

Maya, 30, and Dias, 27, have been dating for months and are always giving their fans little glimpses behind the curtain.

This time the Love Island presenter showed her 3.2million Instagram followers Dias' impressive collection of awards in a selfie on her story.

Maya posed in front of a wall of accolades that Dias has earned throughout his career, giving fans a reminder of just how good her boyfriend is on the pitch.

Trophies behind the TV personality included replicas of Dias' four Premier Leagues and replicas of the Champions League, Community Shield and FA Cup he has won with City.

Masses of Player of the Match awards, Team of the Season trophies and bottles of champagne also adorned the wall.

While Premier League winners medals were also hanging from the display.

Last season was the first year since Dias' £65m move to the Etihad in 2020 that the centre-back hasn't won a trophy with the club.

Dias has just returned to training with City after an extended break away from the pitch following the Cityzens' exploits at the Fifa Club World Cup this summer.

He and Maya enjoyed their time off together, jetting away to Ibiza to rest up and catch some sun.

The pair appeared loved-up in a picture that showed them enjoying each other's company at an Ibiza beach club.

The couple also spent some time in Italy, sharing their first ever picture together on a yacht on the Amalfi Coast.

It's thought that the pair met when they attended the European Music Awards (EMAs) in November.

Since then they have been unable to keep apart and are regularly seen getting cosy with each other.

keywords.name: Man City defender Ruben Dias glittering trophy room

summary: TV star Maya Jama has shared a photo of her boyfriend, Man City defender Ruben Dias, showing off his trophy room in a behind-the-scenes Instagram upload. The Love Island presenter, who has been dating Dias for months, showed her 3.2million followers a selfie showing his impressive collection of awards. The wall included replicas of Dias' four Premier Leagues, Champions League, Community Shield and FA Cup wins with City, and numerous awards throughout his career. This was seen alongside replicas and bottles of champagne. Last season was the first year since Dias's £65m move to the Etihad in 2020 that Dias had not won a trophy with City. Dias recently returned to training with City after an extended break following the Fifa Club World Cup.
shortSummary: Maya Jama shared photos of Ruben Dias' trophy room on Instagram, highlighting his extensive achievements, while he and Maya holidayed together in Ibiza.
argos_summary: TV star Maya Jama shared a glimpse of her boyfriend Ruben Dias' impressive trophy room on Instagram, showcasing his numerous accolades, including Premier League titles and other awards. The couple, who have been dating for several months, recently enjoyed a vacation in Ibiza and Italy, where they shared intimate moments together. Dias, who has returned to training after a break, has not won a trophy with Manchester City in the past season, marking a rare gap since his £65m transfer.
